stochastic_function: lambda age, gender: {0: 1 - (0.0005 * 42) if age == 65 and gender == 'female' else 1 - (0.0005 * 42 ** 2) if age == 75 and gender == 'female' else 1, 180.8: 0.0005 * 42 if age == 65 and gender == 'female' else 0.0005 * 42 ** 2 if age == 75 and gender == 'female' else 0}
variable: long term care expense per day

stochastic_function: lambda age, gender, maximum_coverage_per_day: {0: 1.0} if maximum_coverage_per_day == 0 else ({2669.68: 1.0} if age == 65 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 100 else {3764.89: 1.0} if age == 75 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 100 else {2959.19: 1.0} if age == 65 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 100 else {4959.45: 1.0} if age == 75 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 100 else {3981.47: 1.0} if age == 65 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 150 else {5647.33: 1.0} if age == 75 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 150 else {4438.79: 1.0} if age == 65 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 150 else {7439.18: 1.0} if age == 75 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 150 else {5339.36: 1.0} if age == 65 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 200 else {7529.77: 1.0} if age == 75 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 200 else {5918.38: 1.0} if age == 65 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 200 else {9918.90: 1.0} if age == 75 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 200 else {6674.20: 1.0} if age == 65 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 250 else {9412.22: 1.0} if age == 75 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 250 else {7397.98: 1.0} if age == 65 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 250 else {12398.63: 1.0})

lambda age, maximum_coverage_per_day, insurance_premium_per_year, long_term_care_expense_per_day, life_expectancy: {-365 * long_term_care_expense_per_day - insurance_premium_per_year + 365 * maximum_coverage_per_day: 1.0} if long_term_care_expense_per_day > maximum_coverage_per_day else {-insurance_premium_per_year: 1.0}
evidence: long term care expense per day
